SENT.plain: The regional cerebral blood flow (rCBF), intial slope index (ISI), transfer time (th) and volume (rCBV) were measured simultaneously in 43 hospital patients using a 133Xe intravenous injection method and quantitative dynamic 99Tcm brain scintigraphy
The measurements were made with a gamma camera and the data processing interfaced with a small digital computer

Good agreement was found between the blood flow values determined from the intra-arterial and intravenous injection techniques
